data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 1,539,102 believers in Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Región Metropolitana de Santiago that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Región Metropolitana de Santiago. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

Jesus, I pray that all the Pashtun, Northern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Pashtun, Northern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Pashtun, Northern people is yours.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 5,146,599 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary:
the state of Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile has a population of 6,685,700.

We estimate Región Metropolitana de Santiago has 1,539,102 people who might know Jesus, 4,286,276 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 860,323 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Región Metropolitana de Santiago, Chile.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
